oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Earl Scruggs - set two - 2004-09-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First of four Artist in Residence performances by Earl Scruggs from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 9, 2004. Set two of two. Special guests include Gary Scruggs, John Jorgenson, Bryan Sutton, Jon Randall John Gardner, Rob Ickes, Glen Duncan, Travis Tritt.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Earl Scruggs; Gary Scruggs; John Jorgenson; Bryan Sutton; Jon Randall; John Gardner; Rob Ickes; Glen Duncan; Travis Tritt;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Wildwood Flower (Earl Scruggs - guitar) -- You Are My Flower (Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- Paul And Silas (Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- Sally Goodin (Earl Scruggs - banjo) -- Rolling In My Sweet Baby's Arms (Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- Step It Up And Go (Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- The Ballad Of Jed Clampett (John Jorgenson - vocal) -- Worried Man Blues (Travis Tritt - vocal) -- I Am A Man Of Constant Sorrow (Travis Tritt - vocal) -- Foggy Mountain Breakdown (Earl Scruggs and Travis Tritt - banjo) -- Encore -- Sitting On Top Of The World (Travis Tritt - vocal) -- Lonesome Reuben (Earl Scruggs - banjo) -- Closing comments by Kyle Young.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Scruggs, Earl; Scruggs, Gary; Jorgenson, John; Sutton, Bryan; Stewart, Jon Randall; Gardner, John; Duncan, Glen; Ickes, Rob; Tritt, Travis; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
